detail.content: Vanderbilt Hall | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall                  Conferencing and Special Events                 Vanderbilt Hall                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                            Vanderbilt Hall is located at 40 Washington Square South, between MacDougal and Sullivan Streets. It is one block east of the West Fourth Street subway station ( A, C, D, E, and F lines). Minetta Parking is the nearest parking facility (122 W. 3rd St. between 6th Avenue and MacDougal St., 212-777-3530), however here is a link to additional nearby parking garages: http://www.nyu.edu/about/visitor-information/parking.html .   For detailed pre-recorded directions to the Washington Square campus via all methods of ground transportation, call (212) 995-4989, or view our online directions .   Please select from the links at the left to view descriptions and rates of the rooms located in Vanderbilt Hall.     Faculty Library     Requests for the use of the Faculty Library must be approved by the Office of the Vice Dean. Please note reservations for academic events such as colloquia take priority over receptions, mixers, etc. To submit a request, email Bruce White at WhiteB@exchange.law.nyu.edu   Event organizers whose Faculty Library event requires any type of catering must contact the Office of Hospitality and Food Services to make these arrangements. Please reach out to Elizabeth Thomas at elizabeth.thomas@nyu.edu                                                  Facebook   Twitter   YouTube   Instagram   Visitor Information   Directories   Offices and Departments   Site Map   NYU School of Law                   Prospective Info   Admissions (JD) Admissions (LLM/JSD) Areas of Study Degrees Offered Faculty Profiles Campus Map  Academics   Academic Sitemap Course Descriptions Class Schedules NYU Classes Clinics Academic Calendars  Departments   Academic Services Career Services Financial Aid Graduate Affairs (LLM) Hospitality and Events Housing Human Resources Library Operations and Facilities Records and Registration Student Affairs  Tools and Resources   About the Law School Campus Map Directories Law School News Journals Picture Book                      © 2015 New York University School of Law. 40 Washington Sq. South, New York, NY 10012. Tel. (212) 998-6100

Tishman Auditorium | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall › Tishman Auditorium                  Hospitality and Food Services                 Tishman Auditorium                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                           Room Capacity   Event: 450  Standard Set-up   View PDF Floorplan     Pricing   New York University: $825.00  External: $1,100.00     Venue Description   Tishman Auditorium is located on the first floor of Vanderbilt Hall. The auditorium can accommodate up to 450 people, and each chair has an attached, flip-up writing desk. The proscenium arched stage measures 30 x 15 feet, and there is 3 feet of space between the stage and the first row of seats.   Since Tishman is a lecture hall as opposed to a theater, stage lighting is minimal. The Office of Hospitality and Food Services can assist you with ordering additional lighting for your particular needs. The auditorium is equipped with a projection booth and a screen, which lowers from the ceiling for multi-media presentations. Golding Lounge | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall › Golding Lounge                  Hospitality and Food Services                 Golding Lounge                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                           Room Capacity   Reception: 150 people (Includes both East and West Wing)  Theater Style: 40 people (in East or West Wing)     Pricing   NYU Law School Offices: $25.00 (per each Wing or Main Lounge)  NYU Law School Student Organizations: $25.00 (per each wing, or Main Lounge - weekends only)  External: No Non-Law school rental at this time.     Room Availability   NYU Law School Student Organizations: weekdays after 6:30pm and Friday's after 3:00pm until Sunday evening.  NYU Law School Student Organizations and Non-NYU Law Organizations: no events permitted during finals.     Venue Description   Located on the second floor in Vanderbilt Hall. The room contains casual, small table and chair groupings throughout and is abutted by a large outdoor terrace. Greenberg Lounge | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall › Greenberg Lounge                  Hospitality and Food Services                 Greenberg Lounge                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                           Room Capacity   Conference: 25 people   View PDF Floorplan   Theatre: 175 people   View PDF Floorplan   Hollow Square: 72 people   View PDF Floorplan   U-Shape: 60 people (90 with seating inside the “u”)   View PDF Floorplan   Round Tables: 150 people  [250 people with no other tables in room **additional rental and labor fees applied**]   View PDF Floorplan   Classroom: 100 people (additional rental fees applicable to this set-up)   View PDF Floorplan   Reception: 350 people   View PDF Floorplan     Pricing   New York University: $825.00  External: $1,100.00     Venue Description   Greenberg Lounge is located on the first floor of Vanderbilt Hall, directly across the hall from Tishman Auditorium . A classically detailed room, Greenberg Lounge features high ceilings, parquets flooring, oriental carpets, and extensive molding. There is a piano for use in this room, which is subject to a $150.00 tuning fee.   The Lounge has a capacity of 350 people for a standing reception, and can seat 150 people facing the built-in stage or 175 people facing Washington Square Park. The room has a large working fireplace, casual sofas, and armchair seating is located throughout. An extra labor fee will be added to your event if all furniture is removed from Greenberg Lounge to accommodate the full 230 person round table event. If you would like to utilize this space for a sitdown event for over 150 people please contact Bruce White at bruce.white@nyu.edu .     Catering   Catered functions that require china service will be subject to an additional rental fee. The functionality of this space does not allow for hot served meals. Vanderbilt Hall Classrooms and Seminar Rooms - Capacities | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall › Classrooms & Seminar Rooms                  Hospitality and Food Services                 Vanderbilt Hall Classrooms and Seminar Rooms - Capacities                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                            Law School Pricing   *University does not include Law School. Law School Offices, Law School Student Organizations: $25.00 per classroom (weekends only). All University events recieve a 25% discount on the external room rate.     Rooms           Room   Capacity   Pricing       Classroom 204   124     $468.75 (University)  $625.00 (External)         Classroom 206   112   $450.00 (University)  $600.00 (External)       Classroom 210   148   $525.00 (University)  $700.00 (External)       Classroom 214   104     $393.75 (University)  $525.00 (External)         Classroom 216   70   $393.75 (University)  $525.00 (External)       Classroom 218   112   $450.00 (University)  $600.00 (External)       Classroom 220   124   $468.75 (University)  $625.00 (External)       Seminar Room 201   24   $318.75 (University)  $475.00 (External)       Seminar Room 202   47   $318.75 (University)  $475.00 (External)       Seminar Room 208   25   $318.75 (University)  $475.00 (External)           Venue Description   Vanderbilt Hall features "smart classrooms" with sloped seating, continuous desktops, an internet connection at each seat, laptop projection capabilities, audiovideo conferencing, and audiovideo recording capabilities.   *For any audio visual needs, please contact Audio Visual at (212) 992-7378 or avrequest@exchange.law.nyu.edu . A classically detailed room, Greenberg Lounge features high ceilings, parquets flooring, oriental carpets, and extensive molding. There is a piano for use in this room, which is subject to a $150.00 tuning fee.   The Lounge has a capacity of 350 people for a standing reception, and can seat 150 people facing the built-in stage or 175 people facing Washington Square Park. The room has a large working fireplace, casual sofas, and armchair seating is located throughout. An extra labor fee will be added to your event if all furniture is removed from Greenberg Lounge to accommodate the full 230 person round table event. If you would like to utilize this space for a sitdown event for over 150 people please contact Bruce White at bruce.white@nyu.edu .     Catering   Catered functions that require china service will be subject to an additional rental fee. The functionality of this space does not allow for hot served meals. Vanderbilt Hall | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall                  Conferencing and Special Events                 Vanderbilt Hall                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                            Vanderbilt Hall is located at 40 Washington Square South, between MacDougal and Sullivan Streets. It is one block east of the West Fourth Street subway station ( A, C, D, E, and F lines). Minetta Parking is the nearest parking facility (122 W. 3rd St. between 6th Avenue and MacDougal St., 212-777-3530), however here is a link to additional nearby parking garages: http://www.nyu.edu/about/visitor-information/parking.html .   For detailed pre-recorded directions to the Washington Square campus via all methods of ground transportation, call (212) 995-4989, or view our online directions .   Please select from the links at the left to view descriptions and rates of the rooms located in Vanderbilt Hall.     Faculty Library     Requests for the use of the Faculty Library must be approved by the Office of the Vice Dean. Please note reservations for academic events such as colloquia take priority over receptions, mixers, etc. To submit a request, email Bruce White at WhiteB@exchange.law.nyu.edu   Event organizers whose Faculty Library event requires any type of catering must contact the Office of Hospitality and Food Services to make these arrangements. Please reach out to Elizabeth Thomas at elizabeth.thomas@nyu.edu                                                  Facebook   Twitter   YouTube   Instagram   Visitor Information   Directories   Offices and Departments   Site Map   NYU School of Law                   Prospective Info   Admissions (JD) Admissions (LLM/JSD) Areas of Study Degrees Offered Faculty Profiles Campus Map  Academics   Academic Sitemap Course Descriptions Class Schedules NYU Classes Clinics Academic Calendars  Departments   Academic Services Career Services Financial Aid Graduate Affairs (LLM) Hospitality and Events Housing Human Resources Library Operations and Facilities Records and Registration Student Affairs  Tools and Resources   About the Law School Campus Map Directories Law School News Journals Picture Book                      © 2015 New York University School of Law. 40 Washington Sq. Tishman Auditorium | NYU School of Law                          Skip to main content                                     ›               Quicklinks       Areas of Study   Calendar   Career Services   Colloquia   Courses   Departments   Directories   Docket   Housing   Library   News and Press   NYU Home   Student Links   Technology                                              JD Admissions   Faculty & Scholarship   Global Opportunities   LLM/JSD Admissions   Academics & Courses   Law & Business   Executive Education   Current Students   Public Service   About NYU Law   Alumni & Giving   Centers & Institutes                               Home › Hospitality and Food Services › Venue Information/ Reserve a Venue › Vanderbilt Hall › Tishman Auditorium                  Hospitality and Food Services                 Tishman Auditorium                 Vanderbilt Hall       Classrooms & Seminar Rooms   Golding Lounge   Greenberg Lounge   Snow Dining Room   Tishman Auditorium                           Room Capacity   Event: 450  Standard Set-up   View PDF Floorplan     Pricing   New York University: $825.00  External: $1,100.00     Venue Description   Tishman Auditorium is located on the first floor of Vanderbilt Hall. The auditorium can accommodate up to 450 people, and each chair has an attached, flip-up writing desk. The proscenium arched stage measures 30 x 15 feet, and there is 3 feet of space between the stage and the first row of seats.   Since Tishman is a lecture hall as opposed to a theater, stage lighting is minimal. The Office of Hospitality and Food Services can assist you with ordering additional lighting for your particular needs. The auditorium is equipped with a projection booth and a screen, which lowers from the ceiling for multi-media presentations. Room Availability   NYU Law School Student Organizations: weekdays after 6:30pm and Friday's after 3:00pm until Sunday evening.  NYU Law School Student Organizations and Non-NYU Law Organizations: no events permitted during finals.     Venue Description   Located on the second floor in Vanderbilt Hall. The room contains casual, small table and chair groupings throughout and is abutted by a large outdoor terrace.
